mapper.select: select items_no, items_name, items_company, items_price,items_context, items_color, items_stock, items_model, items_manufacture, items_origin, items_attachtype, items_attachoname, items_attachsname from items order by items_no

mapper.update: update items set items_name = #{itemsName}, items_company = #{itemsCompany}, items_price = #{itemsPrice}, items_color= #{itemsColor}, items_stock = #{itemsStock}, items_model = #{itemsModel}, items_maunfacture = #{itemsManufacture}, items_origin = #{itemsOrigin}, items_attachoname = #{itemsAttachOname}, items_attachsname = #{itemsAttachSname}, items_attachtype = #{itemsAttachtype}
